svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 10 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 10, 2024" date: "2024-08-10"
Eth News and Links
All core devs
â€¢ All Core Devs - Consensus (ACDC) #139 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : a few
client issues, tested recovery from non-finality Pectra-devnet-3 : expected soon with EIP7702 (set EOA
account code) Weekly testing call: starts Monday EIP7594 PeerDAS : sampling to be ignored on next
PeerDAS devnet Node monitoring using discv5 : 42% of nodes use Lighthouse, 36% in US, 50% in data
centers
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : a few client issues, tested recovery from
non-finality Pectra-devnet-3 : expected soon with EIP7702 (set EOA account code) Weekly testing call:
starts Monday EIP7594 PeerDAS : sampling to be ignored on next PeerDAS devnet
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade:
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-2 : a few client issues, tested recovery from non-finality
Pectra-devnet-2 : a few client issues, tested recovery from non-finality
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-3 : expected soon with EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
Pectra-devnet-3 : expected soon with EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
â€¢ Weekly testing call: starts Monday
Weekly testing call: starts Monday
â€¢ EIP7594 PeerDAS : sampling to be ignored on next PeerDAS devnet
EIP7594 PeerDAS : sampling to be ignored on next PeerDAS devnet
â€¢ Node monitoring using discv5 : 42% of nodes use Lighthouse, 36% in US, 50% in data centers
Node monitoring using discv5 : 42% of nodes use Lighthouse, 36% in US, 50% in data centers
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
â€¢ consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.4 : fixes off-by-one in MaxEB consolidation processing
consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.4 : fixes off-by-one in MaxEB consolidation processing
â€¢ PeerDAS: PeerDAS without peer sampling (SubnetDAS) proposal, minimal form of DAS which can be
shipped in a few months PeerDAS breakout #5
PeerDAS:
â€¢ PeerDAS without peer sampling (SubnetDAS) proposal, minimal form of DAS which can be shipped in a
few months
PeerDAS without peer sampling (SubnetDAS) proposal, minimal form of DAS which can be shipped in a few
months
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #5
PeerDAS breakout #5
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Flashbots: TEE-Boost , proposal for validators to accept TEE proofs directly from block builders,
reduce & eventually remove relays in MEV-Boost
Research
â€¢ BRAID : multi-proposers by running multiple consensus processes in parallel, early stage
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.3.0 : faster beacon node startup, improved block proposal
reliability, improved validator client broadcast and gossipsub IDONTWANT support Lodestar v1.21.0 :
docker image changed to debian, adds execution layer client info to graffiti and performance
improvements via napi-rs BLST bindings Teku v24.8.0 : updated metrics, requires Java 21+
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Lighthouse v5.3.0 : faster beacon node startup, improved block proposal reliability, improved
validator client broadcast and gossipsub IDONTWANT support
Lighthouse v5.3.0 : faster beacon node startup, improved block proposal reliability, improved
â€¢ Lodestar v1.21.0 : docker image changed to debian, adds execution layer client info to graffiti and
performance improvements via napi-rs BLST bindings
Lodestar v1.21.0 : docker image changed to debian, adds execution layer client info to graffiti and
â€¢ Teku v24.8.0 : updated metrics, requires Java 21+
Teku v24.8.0 : updated metrics, requires Java 21+
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon v3.0.0-alpha2 : adds OtterSync fast sync by downloading state via
BitTorrent, improves chain tip performance and reduces disk footprint Reth v1.0.4 : RPC fixes and
resolves IO deadlock edge case during sync
Execution layer:
â€¢ Erigon v3.0.0-alpha2 : adds OtterSync fast sync by downloading state via BitTorrent, improves chain
tip performance and reduces disk footprint
Erigon v3.0.0-alpha2 : adds OtterSync fast sync by downloading state via BitTorrent, improves chain
â€¢ Reth v1.0.4 : RPC fixes and resolves IO deadlock edge case during sync
Reth v1.0.4 : RPC fixes and resolves IO deadlock edge case during sync
Layer 2
â€¢ Arbitrum Orbit chains bridged USDC as gas token
Arbitrum Orbit chains bridged USDC as gas token
â€¢ Mode, Zora & Metal upgrade ownership changed to Optimism Foundation & security council
Mode, Zora & Metal upgrade ownership changed to Optimism Foundation & security council
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7750 : Decentralized employment system ERC7751 : Wrapping of bubbled up
reverts ERC7752 : Equity token ERC7753 : Algorithmically generated NFT ERC7754 : Tamperproof web
immutable transaction
â€¢ ERC7750 : Decentralized employment system
ERC7750 : Decentralized employment system
â€¢ ERC7751 : Wrapping of bubbled up reverts
ERC7751 : Wrapping of bubbled up reverts
â€¢ ERC7752 : Equity token
ERC7752 : Equity token
â€¢ ERC7753 : Algorithmically generated NFT
ERC7753 : Algorithmically generated NFT
â€¢ ERC7754 : Tamperproof web immutable transaction
ERC7754 : Tamperproof web immutable transaction
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Solhint v5.0.3 : adds imports-order rule to sort Solidity imports topologically & alphabetically
Solhint v5.0.3 : adds imports-order rule to sort Solidity imports topologically & alphabetically
â€¢ Viem experimental adds EIP7702 (set EOA account code) support
Viem experimental adds EIP7702 (set EOA account code) support
â€¢ Rindexer (EVM indexing): adds streaming data & chatbot support
Rindexer (EVM indexing): adds streaming data & chatbot support
â€¢ Rainbow wallet extension impersonation mode
Rainbow wallet extension impersonation mode
â€¢ Tbl : CLI to read/edit Parquet files
Tbl : CLI to read/edit Parquet files
Security
â€¢ Ronin bridge $12M exploit via uninitialized parameter after upgrade, MEV bots front ran, funds have
been returned, $500k bounty
Job Listings
â€¢ Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
â€¢ EF seek a European/Civil Law qualified Legal Counsel
EF seek a European/Civil Law qualified Legal Counsel
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.8 to 701.7 gwei, 10.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9
gwei 10k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 0.8 to 701.7 gwei, 10.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
Gas: 0.8 to 701.7 gwei, 10.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
â€¢ 10k ETH net issuance this week
10k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,197 - $3,004, currently $2,601, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,197 - $3,004, currently $2,601, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.043 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.043 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Zora secondary market for mints via hybrid ERC1155/ERC20 on Uniswap
Zora secondary market for mints via hybrid ERC1155/ERC20 on Uniswap
â€¢ Safe social recovery module by Candide
Safe social recovery module by Candide
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ SEC subpoena 3 crypto VCs in fishing expedition
SEC subpoena 3 crypto VCs in fishing expedition
â€¢ SEC loses to Ripple : judge sets fine at $125M, SEC had asked for $2B
SEC loses to Ripple : judge sets fine at $125M, SEC had asked for $2B
â€¢ New York Fed: Tornado Cash sanctions analysis
New York Fed: Tornado Cash sanctions analysis
General (Defcon edition)
â€¢ Gubsheep: programmable cryptography
Gubsheep: programmable cryptography
â€¢ Dark Skippy : malicious signing device can leak secret keys in transaction signatures
Dark Skippy : malicious signing device can leak secret keys in transaction signatures
â€¢ Sinkclose AMD CPU vulnerability, run code in System Management Mode, requires kernel access
Sinkclose AMD CPU vulnerability, run code in System Management Mode, requires kernel access
â€¢ GhostWrite direct CPU bug in vulnerable RISC-V CPUs
GhostWrite direct CPU bug in vulnerable RISC-V CPUs
â€¢ Garuda and Pari : fast & small SNARKs via equifficient polynomial commitments
Garuda and Pari : fast & small SNARKs via equifficient polynomial commitments
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-august-10-2024
